name: Arcade Classics (2023)
description:
Blast your way through wave after wave of asteroids and enemy spaceships, or break away at bricks until you reveal the beautiful night sky!

CHALLENGE YOURSELF OLD SCHOOL


Enjoy a challenging collection of arcade classics, all remade in a friendly pixelated art style and a beautiful soundtrack. Try to best your highscore and get all the achievements.

The games start easy but become quite challenging as you progress. Everything becomes faster, enemies become more aggressive, and powerups and extra lives more rare.

Asteorids

Fight off wave after wave of asteroids and enemy ships with one of 3 spaceships available to you, all with different abilities. With each wave the number of asteroids increases and the enemies become more aggressive, making you work harder and harder.


Pick one of 3 ships before you go into action:

Breakout

Colorful bricks are covering the night sky and it's up to you to destroy them so the citizens can get a clear view of the beautiful stars. Use either of the 2 distinct paddles and balls, and combine them and their capabilities to get as far as you can. Watch out for exploding bricks and try to avoid the nasty reverse control "powerup". Mind you; as you progress things get faster.


Select a loadout of paddle and ball to help you destroy the bricks:

Roadmap

Upon release in June 2023, games included are Asteroids and Breakout. For no additional cost, Space Invaders and Centipede will be added Q1 2024.
